conclusion: Determine possible scenarios of particle's motion within time interval 0 to t1 using v-t graph.
Particle passes through the same position three times due to graph symmetry.
Particle passes through the origin (0,0) three times.
Graph shows particle moving in straight line with negative then positive acceleration.
Particle passes through origin three times, suggesting reversal of direction.
Particle accelerates from origin to a certain position.
Particle decelerates back to origin, indicating change in direction.
Scenario 1: Acceleration from origin to certain position then deceleration back.
Scenario 2: Acceleration from origin to certain position then reversal of direction.
Scenario 3: Acceleration from origin to certain position then deceleration back.
Particle passes through origin three times, indicating straight line motion and reversal.
Possible scenarios within time interval 0 to t1 are: Scenario 1, Scenario 2, Scenario 3.
